page.title: 06The Arnold Arms
page.content: The Arnold Arms is in Barby. Behind the Pub there are some Zebra Finches, Chinese Quails and a few canaries. Also in the garden there are two swings and a rocking horse. There were five Pubs in Barby but this is the only one left. The Pub was and is the focal point of the village being a meeting place for the Cricket, Football and other clubs. There is a lounge, a meeting room and the Public Bar that has a Dart Board, a Skittles Table and a Pool Table. There are Ladies' and Mens' teams for Skittles and Darts. In the Winter there is a proper fire. When we visited the Landlord we think we may have woken him up but he was very kind to us and knew a lot about Barby in the old days. We were invited in even though it was only nine o'clock in the morning.
